column1: #! augmented by entries from the Ethnologue.  See also
#!   3-char code | 2-char code where available | language name | comma-separated list of countries where language is used.
#! The 3-char code for Bengali (ben) does have a 2-char equivalent (bn).
#! However, I have removed the 2-char code below, because if we use it, texts
#! are recorded as Bangala rather than Bengali.  In fact, Bangala is a
#! recognised alternative to Bengali, but we have decided we want the texts
